links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..11
Index entries for sequences of form a(n+1)=a(n)^2 + ...
maple: f := proc(n) options remember; if n = 0 then 4 else 1/2*f(n-1)*(f(n-1)+1) fi end
mathematica: a=4;lst={a};Do[b=(a+1)*a/2;AppendTo[lst,b];a=b,{n,1,9}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Mar 16 2010 *)NestList[# (#+1)/2&,4,10] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 20 2012 *)
prog: (Haskell)a013589 n = a013589_list !! na013589_list = iterate a000217 4  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 10 2014
author: Carl Bellinger (carlb(AT)ctron.com)
extensions: One more term from _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Mar 16 2010
